籤詩版本二:
Kusintha kwauzimu kwa Buddha ndi chidziwitso chanu; Zolankhula zachitsiru zimasanduka chikomokere
Mkulu uja anapempha wobwebweta bwanji osadikira nthawi?
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro chozisunga mosasunthika komanso osasuntha.
Chilichonse chimabwera panthawi yake.
解曰:
Mwayi wangwiro. Ndikupatsani zomwe ndingathe. Musakhudze chikhulupiriro chakale. Ndi nthawi yodikira.
Ichi ndi chizindikiro chathunthu. Chilichonse chimalakwika. Dalitso lalikulu. Ikhoza kutsimikizira mtendere.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zipembedzo Zitatu Zikulankhula
Mu ulamuliro wa Mfumu Wu wa kumpoto kwa Zhou Dynasty, zipembedzo zitatu (Confucianism, Buddhism, ndi Taoism) zinali zosiyana. Mfumuyo inaitanitsa msonkhano waukulu ndipo inapempha kuti azikambilana za Confucius, Buddhism ndi Taoism.
Nkhaniyi ndi yophiphiritsa: zipembedzo zitatuzi ndi chipembedzo chimodzi, chitsiru chosadziwa kulingalira, munthu wamphamvu ndi wokangana, ndi zochita za chitsiru.
聖意: Ichi ndi chizindikiro chokwanira, chirichonse chidzakhala chosakondweretsa, ndipo chidzabweretsa madalitso aakulu ndikuonetsetsa mtendere.
